org.apache.nutch.storage

Class StorageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.storage.StorageUtils

  • public class StorageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point to Gora store/mapreduce functionality. Translates the concept of "crawlid" to the corresponding Gora support.
